thread.section_title: Solar Quotes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Solar Quotes | solarquotes.com.au
thread.title: M Hilton
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by M Hilton

author: M Hilton
title: M Hilton
text: A great deal of information both technical and financial which was relatively easy to work through based on the sensible links found at the bottom of each page. It gave me a clear picture of the current state of the technology and whether it was worthwhile for me in purely financial terms based on my current circumstances. Ratings for suppliers was also useful. Navigation back to some pages to verify previous information was difficult, I had to remember how I got there. On the whole it was a very useful and informative experience, I will use the site again.
